name: insecurely
content:
insecurely adverb
(NOT SAFELY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not safe or strong: The shelves were insecurely fastened and fell to the floor.
More examplesFewer examplesThey remove any weak or insecurely rooted trees.The car's trim is insecurely attached and falls off easily.Her hat was perched insecurely on top of her head.The organization is inadequately and insecurely funded.

insecurely adverb
(NOT CONFIDENTLY)
in a way that shows someone is not confident or not certain: The song was a little insecurely performed. See
insecure
More examplesFewer examplesShe started insecurely, but gained confidence.I heard his voice piping insecurely.
